name: TotalKneeReplacement
title: Total Knee Replacement
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent total knee replacement (TKR) procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with total knee replacement (TKR).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes for revision or partial knee replacement procedures.)
